title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines native access to Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that talks to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your box.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, async, and streaming support; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick pulls, lists, and prompts from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot plugin that routes suggestions through a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose snippets for development and production.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions via Ollama; supports slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for the Ollama REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Reddit discussion showing how llama.cpp server mode can be used as an Ollama back-end for extra speed.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder components for pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama4j client bean for Java microservices.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with notes” pane powered by a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for integration testing of LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate exposing typed async/await wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Official example showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7b on your dataset and serve it with Ollama.
